system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Plateau dwarves have Dvergjar as their native language, and can select Reformed Dwemer or Trade Bant Simplified as a secondary language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Plateau dwarves have a base Combat Point score of 13.
  • Plateau dwarves CHP formula is CON Score + 4.

Physical Description

A healthy plateau dwarf typically stands between 4-5½’, and weighs between 140-170 lbs. The men are slightly taller than the women on average. The male dwarfs begin to grow a beard right at the beginning of adulthood, which is a prized and cherished possession and badge of manhood, while a female dwarf’s hair begins to grow to an impressive length, which is well kept and treasured as a symbol of womanhood. Dwarven skin tone ranges from a light brown to a dark brown, and their hair ranges from light brown to black, usually in a straight texture. The average dwarven lifespan is 145 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 19-25. Plateau dwarven eye color tends to range from dark brown to light hazel.

Language

The native language of a plateau dwarf is Dvergjar, but many speak, read, and can write in Trade Bant Simplified or Reformed Dwemer.

Names

Plateau dwarves have two names, the first name usually being an adjective describing them and the second name being a noun, most often an animal or plant, but it is not unheard of to have other nouns besides plants or animals.
